EmailTemplate.name: 00 Pre-Reading WLD
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre Reading Inforemation: ENS Workshop Leader Development Program on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ENS International Participant Email
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
'Get more of what you want'
As part of our preparation for our WLD on 7-10 May, and to get our mindsets aligned, here are some pre-readings.
These are
Recognizing Sub-Optimal Negotiation Outcomes Planning Your Negotiation Style ENSI Leader’s Guide (LG) Section 2.1 ‘Commence Day 1’ (to show you the LG layout) Broad WLD Agenda ENSI Terminology/Acronym
Towards having a great WLD experience…
ENS International - Level 5, 83 York Street, Sydney 2000, NSW, Australia Phone: +61 2 9299 9688
